channel.title: rtl-sdr on cloventt
channel.description: Recent content in rtl-sdr on cloventt

item.title: Running OpenWebRx with DMR in Docker behind an Nginx reverse proxy
item.description: I finally received my RTL-SDR in the mail at the start of the year, and I’ve been tinkering with it off-and-on whenever I get some time to myself on my computer. One of the issues I’ve run into is that there doesn’t seem to be an absolute “killer app” for SDR on Linux, with all of the top options on the RTL-SDR blog being Windows-only. So the hunt was on for something I could use.
